long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For Archer Affiliate users, this Chrome extension is designed to simplify the affiliate marketing process on Amazon. By automatically identifying product ASINs within the Archer program, the extension enables affiliates to generate Archer Affiliate links for any Amazon product quickly. This functionality not only saves time but also ensures accuracy in link creation, making it easier for affiliates to share products and earn commissions.
